segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and frankly, it's making me quite irritated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly oblivious to their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally pouring out of the sink, flooding the cabinets and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a waste of water, it's just running freely and creating a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, her foot submerged in the puddle, yet she continues polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredibly irresponsible to be so unaware, especially with children around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And speaking of the children, that boy is being incredibly reckless on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to hurt himself, or worse, break something valuable when he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just as bad, complicit in this forbidden cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene screams neglect and a complete lack of attention to safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly frustrating to witness such preventable chaos unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
